subNodes.conversationText: root
Wonderful, you returned safely.  Many of our friends have arrived to help defend Charnia.
We had hoped for more, but there wasn't enough time for them to prepare troops.
Galdor, Veloria, Sildor, Sandur, Ulrind, Derik, Boone, Vin, Fimblin, and others have arrived.
Mother, father, it is good to see you here.
We came as quickly as we could, Miki.  Together we shall defeat this evil witch.
Boone...Ulrind...Derik...I knew you guys would make it.
There was no way we were going to miss this and we figured that you could use our help.
Sildor and Sandur, it is so good to see you here.
We came as soon as we received word.  We fought in the first Great Battle for Charnia and we were not going to miss out on this one either.
The time has come...Jadissan will arrive shortly.
Friends, to your stations and may The Great Elos give us strength.
To battle...
|***ga_load_mod-->String::lanterna_MP_04    String::wp_PC_bat_start    |
